sentence.text: Interestingly, PKM2 has been recognized as one of the essential genes for the cancer-specific energy metabolism termed the AAAAAldquo;Warburg effectAAAAArdquo;.
Also, we examined the regulatory mechanisms of PKM isoform expression by testing each of these miRNAs in human cancer cell lines.
Moreover, the expression levels of these miRNAs were downregulated in cancer cells that had originated from these tissues, resulting in PKM2 dominance.

Our results suggest that the organ-specific distribution of miRNAs is one of the principal means by which miRNA establishes characteristics of a tissue and that dysregulation of these miRNAs results in cancer development through a change in the ratio of PKM isoform expression.
